Package jparsec.graph.chartRendering

Provides classes for sky and planetary rendering.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Graphics
    The main Graphics interface to provide rendering support in different platforms.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AWTGraphics
    Implements the Graphics interface for Java desktop platform, with anaglyph support and optional sub-pixel precision.
    PlanetRenderElement
    A class to instantiate an adequate object for rendering operations.
    Projection
    Provides support for drawing the sky using different kind of projections.
    RenderEclipse
    Calculates eclipse maps and local circumstances.
    RenderPlanet
    A class for planetary rendering.
    RenderSatellite
    A class for satellite rendering.
    RenderSky
    A class for sky rendering This class performs sky rendering operations.
    SatelliteRenderElement
    A class to instantiate an adequate object for rendering operations.
    SkyRenderElement
    A class to instantiate an adequate object for sky rendering operations.
    SVGPlanets
    An implementation of SVG planetary icons (vector graphics) in AWT, using SVG2Java library.
    TrajectoryElement
    Support class for sky rendering operations, allowing to represent trajectory paths of Solar System objects or stars.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Graphics.ANAGLYPH_COLOR_MODE
    The set of color modes for the anaglyph method.
    Graphics.FONT
    The set of supported fonts for rendering.
    Projection.PROJECTION
    The set of available projections.
    RenderSky.OBJECT
    The set of different object types when rendering the sky.
    SatelliteRenderElement.PLANET_MAP
    The set of options to show the Earth map.
    SkyRenderElement.COLOR_MODE
    The set of available color modes to render the sky.
    SkyRenderElement.CONSTELLATION_CONTOUR
    The set of options to draw constellation contours.
    SkyRenderElement.FAST_LINES
    The set of options to draw fast lines for better performance.
    SkyRenderElement.HORIZON_TEXTURE
    The set of options to draw texture at horizon.
    SkyRenderElement.LEYEND_POSITION
    The set of values to select how to draw labels.
    SkyRenderElement.MILKY_WAY_TEXTURE
    The set of textures for the milky way.
    SkyRenderElement.REALISTIC_STARS
    The set of values to select the kind of realistic stars to render.
    SkyRenderElement.STAR_LABELS
    The set of options to draw star labels.
    SkyRenderElement.SUPERIMPOSED_LABELS
    The set of values to select how to draw labels.
    TrajectoryElement.LABELS
    The set of label types.

Package jparsec.graph.chartRendering Description

Provides classes for sky and planetary rendering.

This package contains methods for sky and planetary rendering.
